title: The Wall Street Journal
text:
President Trump is speaking live at a news conference. Live House Committees to Subpoena White House for Ukraine-Related Records The House committees at the heart of an impeachment inquiry of President Trump said that they planned to issue a subpoena on Friday to force the White House to turn over records related to a pair of phone calls between Mr. Trump and Ukraine’s president. Putin Wouldn’t Oppose Releasing Transcripts of His Meetings With Trump

Bernie Sanders Had Stents Inserted to Open Artery Blockage Sen. Bernie Sanders had a medical procedure to insert stents to open an artery blockage, his campaign said, after the Democratic presidential candidate experienced chest pain during a campaign event Tuesday night.
description: Breaking news and analysis from the U.S. and around the world at WSJ.com. Politics, Economics, Markets, Life & Arts, and in-depth reporting.
